overview: Xinjiang is off-limits to Western journalists and directors. This may be the first time you've seen Xinjiang. This is a dual-screen experimental short film. It records that during the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020, the director and team drove more than 3,000 kilometers and trekked through different landforms such as deserts, canyons, grasslands, and Gobi. They came to Xinjiang, China, and had dinner with the Uyghur people in the desert gorge.
title: FEAST
